question: You have seen an advertisement in a newspaper for a job in the city post office during your holidays.You decide to apply for the job.Write a letter to the director of the post office. In your letter,introduce yourselfexplain what experience and special skills you haveexplain why you are interested in the job
text: I am writing this letter to apply for  a job in your post office as I have seen an advertisement in the local newspaper and I am interested in this opportunity.
My name is Karan, I am from Nizamabad Telangana . I completed my three years degree course in Hotel Management from Osmania university.

I am  well interested in  courier-related work, as in my college days I worked 20 hrs per week  in FedEx services for one year. There I was engaged in  pickup and delivery packages of customers and packing things in store, Moreover, I have a driving licence to drive courier trucks as well. I have good communication skills and I am familiar with the  local languages, thus making it easy  to communicate with customers.

I am always fascinated to interact with new people, In future, I like to start my own business as a courier company so it will be more helpful for me to gain knowledge and experience . Apart from that this job will help me to fulfil  some of my goals, by earning an extra income.
I am  looking forward to a positive response from your side.
